doc.name: AbstractUnscentedKalmanFilter
doc.description: Abstract Unscented Kalman Filter Base Class.
doc.author: Shuhei Emoto
doc.port: The output port that outputs the sigma-points of distribution of state variable at each firing.
State estimate output. A record token with one field per state variable.
doc.property: The value of current time. This parameter is not visible in the expression screen except in expert mode. Its value initially is just 0.0, a double, but upon each firing, it is given a value equal to the current time as reported by the director.
A matrix value used in initialization of sigma points.
An array value used in initialization of state variables.
a matrix value which determine process noise.
